QuestData.Title: Catching Up
QuestData.Description:
Good to see you in one piece, $n. Nazmir is a place of nightmares, but you seem to be surviving.
Rokhan and I convinced your Horde dat we need more support. He is getting ready to meet with reinforcements.
We still need to get de loa's aid. What happened with Bwonsamdi and Hir'eek?
QuestData.LogDescription: Tell Talanji about your experience with Bwonsamdi and Hir'eek.

Objectives.Objective: Tell Talanji about Bwonsamdi and Hir'eek
